SELECT PROJECT_NO, TASK_NO, PROJECT_TITLE , TASK_TITLE , TASK_START , TASK_END FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, p.PROJECT_NO, t.TASK_NO, p.PROJECT_TITLE , t.TASK_TITLE , t.TASK_START , t.TASK_END FROM USER_TASK_MANY utm , PROJECT p , TASK t WHERE utm.PROJECT_NO = p.PROJECT_NO AND utm.TASK_NO = t.TASK_NO AND t.PROJECT_NO = p.PROJECT_NO AND utm.USER_NO = #{user_no} AND p.PROJECT_DELETE_CHK = 0
AND (p.PROJECT_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR t.TASK_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
AND p.PROJECT_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND t.TASK_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND t.TASK_COMP_CHK = 1
AND t.TASK_COMP_CHK = 0
) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
ORDER BY PROJECT_TITLE
ORDER BY TASK_TITLE
ORDER BY TASK_END
